layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutSVGHiddenContainer {defs} at (40,40) size 200x170

      LayoutSVGResourceClipper {clipPath} [id="clip"] [clipPathUnits=userSpaceOnUse]
        LayoutSVGText {text} at (40,87) size 190x90 contains 1 chunk(s)
          LayoutSVGInlineText {#text} at (40,87) size 190x90
            chunk 1 text run 1 at (40.00,160.00) startOffset 0 endOffset 4 width 190.00: "CLIP"
        LayoutSVGContainer {use} at (40,40) size 200x170

    LayoutSVGRect {rect} at (40,40) size 300x300 [fill={[type=SOLID] [color=#008000]}] [x=40.00] [y=40.00] [width=300.00] [height=300.00]
